text: This was my first time buying a car and Richard Kang made the experience absolutely fuss-free and smooth. He also took time to explain the difference between car options, insurance options and financing options. Was very impressed by his knowledge, and his efforts to satisfy customers need. Highly recommend to look for him and Republic Auto up!

Dear Republic Auto Team,

His approach was not only informative but also reassuring, which made the entire experience smooth and stress-free.

There was a good selection of cars which looked well maintained. Desney helped us (as first-time buyers) view and find a car - we would highly recommend asking for him. He was very transparent, gave useful information and shared clear answers to our various questions.

This is the first time buying experience at Republic Auto. We contact sales person Chua Jun Jie, he was very efficient in all replies. Polite & knowledgeable guy, the whole handover process with him was a breeze. A very pleasant & satisfied purchase with him with Republic Auto. Will come back here again for next Mercedes üëç

I was dealing with Desney on the purchase of my car. He remained very professional, patient, and transparent throughout the whole process which is much appreciated when buying a used car. Highly recommended to work with Republic Auto and Desney for pre-owned car purchase and for peace of mind.
